title: Brand new Pixel 3a (Bangalore, India), Unable to install Android 10. Tried both WiFi and Phone Data.
content:
1. Using WiFi (Airtel Broadband 24Mbps)
2. Changed to Phone Data (Airtel 4G network)
3. Changed the WiFi setting in new Phone to 'Treat as Unmetered'
4. Changed the DNS to dns.google
5. Restarting the phone.
6. Press 'Resume' button multiple times
7. Connecting to power source during the installation.
